Wed., March 13: Join us in Jeff City to engage with #MoLeg

CORRECTION: The correct date for the Voices of Liberties Lobby Day in Jefferson City, MO is Wednesday, March 13.

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

The 2019 legislative session is just getting started.

ACLU of Missouri’s goals for smarter justice this year are ambitious and paired with partnerships with coalitions, community members and elected officials. All roads to accomplish these goals end up in Jefferson City.

That’s why we need you. One of the greatest partnerships we make in this battle is with motivated, engaged Missourians like you.

Join us on Wednesday, March 13 for our fourth annual Voices of Liberty Lobby Day. It's your opportunity to tell your elected officials how important it is to protect the rights of all Missourians. Learn about the legislative process and help us defend civil liberties, as you meet with legislators.

“Voices of Liberty” Lobby Day

We are rallying in Jefferson City for the fourth annual ACLU of Missouri “Voices of Liberty” Lobby Day. Transportation to Jefferson City will be provided from Kansas City and St. Louis.

Wednesday, March 13
Missouri State Capitol
201 W Capitol Avenue
Jefferson City, MO 65101

RSVP TODAY

When you vote, you have a voice in the decisions that affect the lives of Missourians. But lobby day offers you another, personal and immediate opportunity to use your voice to engage directly with legislators about the issues that matter.

At Voices of Liberty Lobby Day, you’ll meet with your legislators to discuss ways Missouri can work toward smart justice and inclusion, including:

  • Reducing mandatory minimum sentences.
  • Prioritizing community-based policing to end racial profiling.
  • Stopping the practice of shackling pregnant, imprisoned women.
  • Making sure Missouri’s nondiscrimination laws explicitly protect our LGBTQ communities.
  • Combatting the school-to-prison pipeline with equitable discipline changes.

Need a little extra confidence? We have lobby day trainings across the state to help you know the best talking points, share our strategies, and to meet with your fellow citizen lobbyists beforehand.

Take a stand and make your voice heard for smart justice at the Capitol. Join us for a road trip to Jefferson City.

In solidarity,

Sara E. Baker
Legislative and Policy Director, ACLU of Missouri
